title: DAZED
description: Samatha never imagined her life would ever be very exciting. Residing at Open Arms orphanage, she was just settling in to her new part-time job when life gave her some unexpected surprises. Awakened to passion, Samantha now has to decide which love she will keep and which she will say goodbye to forever. Will she give up the love of her angel Mihr for the longings that Nisroc stirs in her? Or, in the end, will she lose them both?
author: G.R. HEWETT
